listing.listing_description: Look out from a comfortable seat, taking in the ocean spray view from the balcony of this seaside Bantry Bay villa. An interior replete with marble, leather, tasteful art and an abundance of space typifies this home. Fine stone bathrooms, shaded exterior dining spaces, and a cosy media room add to the luxurious atmosphere. An enchanting waterfront, dynamic hiking, and wine country is nearby. Morning will bring light that slowly spreads along the seascape and shore strip that’s visible from Aurum 701’s windows. Located in the heart of the exclusive Bantry Bay suburb, the home’s exterior balcony literally hangs over the frothing surf, offering a breakfast spot with an unrivalled view. Natural light pours into the main living room, amplified by the home’s shining floors and bright interior colour scheme. Rich, welcoming bedrooms are lit by inventive, golden lamps, with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring the dramatic view can be enjoyed by resting guests.Aurum 701’s location is one of the most enviable in the entire Cape Town region. The pleasant strip outside features a huge range of hotels and restaurants, while several excellent beaches are located just to the south, including Clifton beach and Camps Bay beach. The rocky, dynamic expanses of Table Mountain stretch above the villa, offering excellent local hiking and trailhead outings, while local bird and monkey sanctuaries are also close by. Just beyond, the sights and sounds of cosmopolitan Cape Town itself are no more than a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Saint Antoine is a fabulous modern home on the Greek island of Crete, about eight kilometers northeast of Chania. Enjoying a hillside vantage with sweeping views of Souda Bay, the three-story masterwork offers a graceful fusion of indoor and outdoor living, including a wrap-around terrace with infinity swimming pool and alfresco dining. A variety of high-end amenities will meet your desires and needs, including a sauna, exercise room, home office, excellent media features, and a gourmet kitchen. Five comfortable bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms offer ideal accommodations for families and groups of friends up to ten in size.The villa beckons you into the sunlight and open air of the Greek Isles, with approximately 697 square meters of outdoor living space. The terrace extends from both sides of the interior living area, with lovely staircases cascading down to the lower lawn and bedroom balconies. Savor a refreshing dip in the sparkling swimming pool while gazing at the breathtaking vistas, and bask in the sunlight on poolside lounge chairs or sofas. Kindle the barbeque in the afternoon and uncork a bottle of fine Cretan wine. Then gather for memorable feasts against the sublime backdrop of the Aegean Sea.The open-concept interior features a comfortable lounge with fireplace and a dining table for eight, flowing into a light-filled kitchen with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar. The kitchen opens directly to the alfresco grilling and dining area, forming a seamless space for dinner parties. Air conditioning keeps the home cool in the summer months.The bedrooms are adorned with an elegant simplicity, harmonizing with the timeless landscape and sea. Each features a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with high-grade fixtures. The four main-house bedrooms open to spacious balconies with stunning views.Villa Saint Antoine takes its name from an ancient chapel recently discovered next to the estate—one of the myriad treasures along this famed coastline. You're just eight kilometers from the capital city of Chania and its Old Venetian Harbor, and an easy drive to Golden Beach and Iguana Beach. Superb wineries and hiking trails abound in the coastal hills.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Art, architecture and scenery come together to stunning effect at Pitlochry. This beautifully designed, recently built vacation rental uses contemporary paintings, designer furnishings and luxe finishes for a sophisticated yet inviting ambience. Even better, it all sits just steps from the Camps Bay coastline, giving you panoramic views of the ocean and mountains around Cape Town.Watch the sun move across the landscape from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, sound system, loungers and barbecue. Inside, the villa is as well appointed as a luxury hotel, with private media and exercise rooms, a wine cellar, sauna, bar, TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. If you’re traveling as a family, there’s even a children’s playroom.A fold-away glass wall is all that separates the great room from the terrace at Pitlochry, bringing ocean vistas into the open-concept living space. Then again, the views are just as appealing indoors, thanks to a Minotti sectional and fireplace in the sitting area, a dining table for twelve and a fully equipped kitchen backed by a sleek stone panel.The villa’s four bedrooms can accommodate parties of up to eight guests on holiday together. There’s one master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and honeymoon-suite-worthy details like an ocean-facing balcony. The residence also has one bedroom with two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom, one with a double bed and en-suite bathroom, and one with a double bed and mountain views.A stay at Pitlochry puts you close to shopping, dining and beaches in the exclusive Camps Bay area. The villa is also a short drive from several top Cape Town attractions: 10 minutes from Lion’s Head, 15 minutes from the Bo-Kaap Museum, which gives you a peek at the city’s history, and 20 minutes from the Two Oceans Aquarium, which showcases some of the life just offshore.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Lavender perfumes the air and the Cape Town mountains dominate the views around this traditionally chic villa 20 minutes from the city center. Fold-back glass walls and shutters invite the scent and sights into white-walled, wood-floored interiors and a cozy pool house. Walk 2 minutes to the Kirstenbosch Botanical Gardens and drive 5 minutes to the beginning of the Constantia winelands. Start each morning of your holiday with the included French-style breakfast, then send the kids to the play structure while you settle in with a book on a lounger by the pool. Have lunch at the alfresco dining area and, as cocktail hour approaches, make drinks at the wet bar in the pool house or open a bottle of a new favorite South African wine. For evening entertainment, there’s a satellite TV, Wi-Fi, and a wood-burning fireplace. You can see the mountains from the double doors at the entrance to this vacation rental—and the views set the tone for the whole house. Follow the planks of the wood floors to an open-concept sitting area and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, both of which are cooled by the breeze from a fold-back wall. A separate dining room seats 8 and adjoins a second living room. There are 5 bedrooms in the main house at this luxury property and 1 in the pool house. The pool-house bedroom is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. Bring the whole family for a picnic in the Kirstenbosch Botanical Gardens, a 2-minute walk from the villa, or take the grown-ups tasting in the Constantia winelands, which start a 5-minute drive from your doorstep. It’s a 20-minute drive to shopping, sights, and more in the Cape Town city center. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Mango Villas is a luxury development of two spacious independent villas. Situated in a four acre piece of land in an olive grove with more than 100 olive trees, they overlook the delightful Loutraki Bay with a lovely view of the spectacular White Mountains as a colorful contrast.Mango Villas are ideal for family vacations with plenty to keep children of all ages entertained inside and outside. There’s a games console, Wi-Fi access, DVD player, home theater system and satellite television. Equipped as it is for the digital age, it would be impossible to ignore what’s on offer outside the property; a swimming pool, sunbeds, hot tub, terrace with lounge area and garden are the main highlights. Daily housekeeping is included in the cost of your stay as well as a personal concierge and 24 hour guest support, so all you need to do is focus on having the best vacation of your life in charming Chania.The villas are an architectural delight featuring airy rooms and large windows. The pastel interiors combine simple elegance and beautiful design with comfort and luxury. Here, you will renew your spirit and realize that the environment offers you the perfect time, every time.There are three bedrooms split over two levels. On the first level, you’ll find the master bedroom complete with its king size bed, en-suite bathroom and television. The lower level houses the remaining two bedrooms which have double beds that can be converted into singles depending on your needs. Both bedrooms on the lower floor are also en-suite. There’s also a baby cot available in the villas if you need one.Mango Villas are located only a short walk from the sandy, shallow beach of Loutraki. Swimming can be enjoyed in the crystal clear turquoise waters within a lovely sheltered bay. The beach of Loutraki offers sun beds and parasols, a small café for simple lunches, and a restaurant with authentic Cretan cuisine. Approximately 1 km north along the coast is the beautiful beach of Marathi offering several good restaurants and a beach-café. Since the villas are only 9 km from Chania International Airport (CHQ), you’ll be able to start your vacation quickly after touching down on Cretan soil.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated in the lush hilltops of Vrachasi, at the bottom of Mount Kalaritis, this modern villa follows traditional Greek architecture. Every inch of the property is attractive, from its copper-coloured stone accents to slate grey tiles and natural wood décor. Drive 6 minutes into town to discover folklore history at the House of Vrahassi museum before stopping for refreshments at a local café.Views of the Lasithiotika Mountains (where Zeus was secretly born) and the island of Dia can easily be seen from the extended, sea-facing terrace. An alfresco table for 4 offers an intimate dinner spot where you can savour an authentic meal while drinking in the dramatic sunset beyond. The eco-friendly, sapphire swimming pool operates on salt water electrolysis, recirculating every 1.5 hours. In the basement, you’ll find a games room equipped with a cozy home-cinema and ping pong table. Swim and snorkel in the turquoise waters at pristine Volakias Beach—a quaint, pebbled cove located a short drive from Villa Adagio. Unspoiled nature coexists with luxury accommodations in nearby Elounda. The small town features plenty to do, including boutique shopping, dining on fresh fare, and setting sail in the quiet bay. Grab the whole gang and head out for a day trip to Rethymno where charm meets history and cobblestone pathways lead to ancient churches, a picturesque harbour, and a selection of characterful cafés. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: Villa Votsalo is a semi-detached property and can be booked alongside Villa Alpha (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/greece/crete/chania/villa-alpha-120553) to make up the Youphoria Beachfront Estate (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/greece/crete/chania/youphoria-beachfront-estate-120556)! Please inquire with your Villa Specialist for more details!Let’s start with Villa Votsalo’s most important attribute: beachfront. It’s rare, sought after, and it can be yours. This luxurious five bedroom vacation home is located at the southern most point of Kissamos Bay’s gorgeous beach, perfectly situated for snorkelling, fishing, and bird watching. Enjoy the ocean breeze, local greenery, and relaxed island lifestyle of Crete at Villa Votsalo.Stylish and modern, this vacation rental has everything you need, without any of the clutter. Minimalistic design allows the turquoise ocean, blue skies, and glowing sun to be the focal points of your stay in Crete. Votsalo’s interior is simple, yet sophisticated. Clean lines, neutral tones, and high-quality furniture make relaxation imminent. The living room is perfect for a movie night in with the family. The dining area and kitchen are ideal for easy meal preparation and socializing. And, the open-concept layout brings all of these spaces together seamlessly.At dinner, you’ve got the choice between the formal dining area with seating for eight, or six could dine alfresco on the terrace. The kitchen is fully equipped with state of the art appliances and outside there’s a barbecue. Also outside, the alfresco shower and infinity pool are perfect for cooling off on a hot day. The air conditioning inside works great for that too, and there’s Wi-Fi, television, and a sound system as well.Three of Votsalo’s bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and either a balcony or garden view. There are two other bedrooms located on the lower lever with a second fully equiped kitchen.This area of Crete has been home to many significant archeological discoveries, many of which are displayed in local museums. Another important historical, and present, attraction is the fishing. Spend an afternoon exploring local fishing taverns, dining at nearby restaurants, or charter a boat and see if you can catch your own dinner.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience 4-levels of uninterrupted ocean views at this modern cliffside home in Cape Town. Wake up to dramatic ocean vistas, no matter which bedroom you choose. Outside, pick your favorite level of the terrace for sunbathing. Then, retreat to the pool’s secluded grotto to cool off. If you’re feeling energetic, hike 90-minutes to the top of Lion’s Head to check out the best view in the city.Lush lawns, mature trees, and rugged boulders decorate Icaria’s expertly-manicured exterior, while inside, sleek and trendy design is sure to awaken your inner minimalist. Follow stone-tiled floors through Icaria’s smooth-white interior. Feel the natural warmth from exposed-wood features. And, embrace the contrast of high-end fixtures and state of the art electronics.Pick up some fresh fish from the local market and let Icaria’s fully-equipped kitchen inspire your inner chef. Or you could fire up the grill for an afternoon barbeque. Inside, the formal dining area is the perfect place to show off your culinary creation, while the alfresco picnic-table/lounge is a gorgeous setting for post-dinner cocktails. After the sun has set, make your way inside to relax by the fireplace.Start your morning with a stroll along the shore of Clifton’s 1st Beach; it’s just a 10-minute walk from home. Embrace the sand in a new way at Atlantis and Betty’s Bay where sandboarding tours down the dunes have recently become popular. At night, check what’s playing at the Galileo Open Air Cinema and watch a new release under the stars.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With Table Mountain towering nearby, guests can taste the very best of the Cape at this luxury villa. Set amidst rambling gardens and lengthy lawns, this sunlit home is in one of the city’s most desirable neighborhoods. Take in the morning mist pouring off the mountain from your dining terrace, indulge in fruitful shopping outings, or experience the cool bay breeze as you visit nearby vineyards.Beginning the day by soaking up sunshine on the sundeck of this wonderfully spacious Bishopscourt home. As the morning progresses, take to the full-sized tennis court, or dive into 1 of the 2 pools for total refreshment. Children will love the lengthy gardens and panorama of the nearby mountain, while adults will appreciate the modern decor, bright colors and chic vibe of the home itself, which is generously spread over 2 levels to provide sufficient privacy and comfort. Surrounded by a small wood of varied hardwoods and naturally providing considerable privacy, guests will feel compelled to converge and converse on the shaded lower deck, or on the airy upper balcony, as birdsong fills the air and the sun traverses over the dramatic landscape.The dynamic environment of the Cape and False Bay are at guests’ fingertips from 18 on Hillwood. The grape-packed slopes of the renowned Constantina Vineyards, which offers tours, tastings and 2 well-reviewed restaurants are just moments away, while the explosion of color that is the national botanic gardens are on the villa’s doorstep. All the delights of this part of Cape Town are nearby, from walks and hikes through local forests and preserved zones, to exciting rugby matches at Newlands Stadium, to exceptional dining and shopping experiences in the nearby district of Newlands. A cooling sundowner drink on the terrace after a packed day is always a fine way to finish off an evening.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Every sense is indulged by the artwork, modern design, and the sound, scent, and salt air of the ocean at this contemporary-glam Cape Town retreat. The villa perches over a rocky stretch of shore and mimics the landscape with its concrete and timber frame, all while taking in panoramic views of the Atlantic. It’s a 10-minute drive to the white sand and seafood restaurants lining Camps Bay Beach.Listen to the waves hitting the shore while doing some splashing of your own in the oceanfront swimming pool, stretch out in the shade of umbrellas covering the outdoor sitting areas, and let the gas barbecue inspire your own version of a South African braai. Entertain with the help of the indoor pizza oven, bar, and integrated sound system, or take a moment to yourself with the help of the exercise room, cable TV, and Wi-Fi.This vacation rental’s two-story living spaces make a bold statement, whether in the expanse of the open-concept layout, the cheeky artwork lining the walls, or the gold columns defining the space. Wall-to-wall glass offers ocean views in the upstairs living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen, and in the downstairs family room and bar.There are 3 bedrooms at this luxury property: 1 with a king bed and ocean views, 2 with queen beds, all with private ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning. Look for details like leather and velour headboards, along with vibrant art pieces, even in the bathrooms.It’s a 10-minute walk from the villa to Camps Bay Beach, a favorite with locals and visitors alike where you can occasionally spot couples exchanging vows on the white sand and relive your own honeymoon over seafood and wine at a waterfront restaurant. It’s a 5-minute drive to tony Clifton Beach, and 10 minutes by car to holiday must-sees Table Mountain and Lion’s Head.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Amelkis is located in a lush park and is a jewel set in a secured luxury community. The property is located on Golf Amelkis, one of Marrakech's premier courses and will certainly delight all golf lovers. This villa can comfortably accommodate up to 12 people, location and quality of this home offer a quiet and convenient stay for golfers and families alike.With golf, horseback riding and the city just minutes away, Amelkis is the perfect vacation rental for the active and the adventurous. Book tee times at one-or allof the four golf courses within a short walk or drive, or set off from the Royal Equestrian Club. It's well worth taking an afternoon to explore the museums, souks and architecture of Marrakech, but at the very least, sit down to dinner at one of its renowned restaurants.

listing.listing_description: The air is perfumed with lavender and jasmine—and wine, of course—at this circa-1890 estate near Cape Town. The rugged lines of the mountains dwarf the scale of the villa’s gardens, the grounds of the boutique winery it sits on, and the house’s classic Cape Dutch facade. While oenophiles will find plenty to taste here, nearby Constantia has French brasseries, coffee shops, golf courses, and more. Stop to smell the private rose gardens and listen to the trickling of the fountains as you swim in the pool, sip a new favorite South African wine in the outdoor living room, sit down to an al-fresco dining table for eight, or, in cooler weather, read in the glassed-in garden room. There’s a wine cellar to supply you with fresh bottles to open while you watch the satellite-equipped smart TV, listen to the integrated sound system, and catch up via Wi-Fi. A holiday at this vacation rental is a way to step back in time without missing out on the luxury of today. Oregon oak floors link stately living and dining rooms with details like beamed ceilings, brick fireplaces, floor-length drapes, plump sofas, and slipcovered chairs. The fully equipped kitchen opens to a casual dining area and family room. The villa has four bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own lounge area, fireplace, and wraparound balcony overlooking the vineyards and mountains. There’s also one bedroom with a queen bed and one bedroom with a twin bed. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. The St. Leger estate is a 7-minute drive from central Constantia, where you’ll find coffee shops serving excellent lattes, bakeries producing perfectly puffed macarons, restaurants expertly pairing dishes with wine, and even a sports bar showing the latest rugby. It’s also within day-trip distance of several of Cape Town’s best beaches. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find peace and tranquility at this modern-Moroccan home just outside of Marrakech. Let the full-staff, including a chef and spa therapist, cater to your every desire. Work on your tan while gazing upon views of the Atlas Mountains. Catch up on some reading by the fireplace while the kids splash around in the indoor pool. When you’re ready for some action, take a chauffeured ride to Jemaa el-Fna.Stroll through gardens decorated with olive, orange, and lemon trees around Casa de Noor’s classic Moroccan-style exterior. Flow inside, barrier-free to relax in the poolside living room, hammam, or atop a massage table. Pick up something fresh from a local market for a backyard barbecue, inevitably to be followed by a dip in the pool. At night, sip cocktails on the rooftop terrace while you enjoy the mountain view. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, the home gym is ready, or, you could use the indoor pool’s lounge area for a yoga session.Marrakech is an up-and-coming golf destination, with substantial investment over the last few years in expert course revitalization, and new courses popping up all the time. PalmGolf Marrakech Ourika is a desert-style course with incredible views of the Atlas Mountains. After, head into town for some shopping at the Souks, a wander through the Medina, or a tour of Musee de Marrakech. If you need a break from the city, stop in at Jardin Majorelle, a beautiful garden gifted to the town by designer Yves Saint Lauren.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step in from the refreshing sea view balcony of this Clifton villa and feel the warmth of this fine home’s fireplace wash over you. Rich parquet flooring, lengthy sofas, touches of wood and leather, and multiple balconies make for true oceanside comfort. Take up a recliner beside the sun-drenched pool, and sink into a pleasant doze, with a renowned beach, fine restaurants and Table Mountain nearby.Take in the morning air and taste a flavoursome coffee over a dynamic scene of blue water and white froth, with Villa Do Sol‘s terrace being impressively close to the coast. With Clifton Beach stretching off into the distance, guests can prepare for the day in the stone and marble bathrooms, with both air conditioning and a fireplace ensuring the home is always at the ideal temperature. After a relaxing evening chatting and socializing around the provided barbecue, rich, light-filled bedrooms offer soft beds and comforting furnishings to ensure an unbroken night’s sleep.This villa is perched very close to one of the finest beaches in the Cape Town area, with Clifton Beach offering an eye-catching expanse of waves, surf and sand. Take a stroll along the waterfront, or get active with a hike up the established trails of the nearby Lion’s Head to take in sweeping views of the coastline. Take a drive down the coastline to visit more charming towns and picturesque beaches, or turn inland and visit some of the country’s oldest vineyards, which have helped build South Africa’s reputation as a wine superpower.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Designed by renowned architect Stefan Antoni, this modern penthouse uses its scenic perch to capture views of Cape Town’s mountains, Robben Island, and the Atlantic. Swim to the edge of the pool and keep cool while you gaze out to the endless sea. Work on your vacation tan from a lounge chair or lay out a beach towel on the lawn. For a closer look, walk 1-minute down to Mouille Point Beach. Slide open the terrace doors and let the fresh sea breeze flow through the open concept living room. Adorned with elegant marble and designer furnishings, this spacious area is perfect for entertaining. Separating the galley-kitchen from the lounge, you’ll find a fully-outfitted bar that will surely inspire your inner mixologist. At dinner, pick between the 12 and 16 seat formal settings or dine alfresco on the terrace. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, The Penthouse comes with shared access to a state of the art gym and sauna. Or, you could burn off that energy playing ping pong, swimming, or horsing around with the kids in the playroom. After, reward yourself with a soothing soak in the hot tub. And, to make life in Cape Town even more comfortable, The Penthouse comes with a full-staff for the duration of your stay. The Penthouse has a fantastic view, but if you’d like to push the limits, grab your camera and hike 90-minutes up Lion’s Head. At the peak, you’ll be rewarded with the best vantage point in the city. After the hike, head to V&A Waterfront, Cape Town’s entertainment district, for shopping, restaurants, and nightlife. If you’d like to meet some of the local aquatic creatures, check out Two Oceans Aquarium, 8-minutes from home. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gran Villa San Pietro is a superb luxury villa in West Marbella, along Spain's Costa del Sol, just minutes from downtown Marbella and Puerto Banùs. Featuring beautiful and expansive living areas (including outdoor and indoor swimming pools), panoramic views of the coastal hills, and seven deluxe bedrooms, this vacation rental is a dream choice for family reunions, special occasions with friends, and destination wedding guests.The gated estate includes ample patio and terrace space for entertainment and relaxation in the Mediterranean light. Enjoy idyllic hours by the pool on the ground-level terrace, floating in the delicious water and sipping refreshing drinks on sun loungers. Withdraw into the cool and sumptuous covered lounge and savor cava in the afternoon. Cook lunch on the barbeque grill and relish it alfresco on the patio. Take a sunset soak in the hot tub while gazing at the dreamy horizon.From the balcony, wide glass doors open to the villa's Great Room, which can also be accessed through an Andalusian archway in the front. This beautiful, cavernous space, with vaulted ceilings and exposed wood beams, is ideal for festive evenings together. Mix cocktails at the wet bar and toast each other in the lounge. Prepare epic feasts in the fully equipped kitchen, and gather around the dining table deep into the night. In the morning, refresh your body in the exercise room, sauna, and indoor swimming pool.The villa's Main House features five bedrooms, while the Guest Apartment has two bedrooms and a well-appointed living area. In the Main House, three of the bedrooms have king beds, while the other two have two twin beds each. All have ensuite bathrooms and terrace access. In the Guest Apartment, one bedroom has a queen bed and the other has two single beds. They share a bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, dining and living areas, and two extra sofa beds.Your location strikes a lovely balance between privacy and proximity to some of Spain's most enchanting destinations. You're two minutes from the nearest markets, restaurants, and shops, and five minutes from San Pedro de Alcantra. The beach at Puerto Banus is ten kilometers away, while the cities of Malaga and Ronda can be reached easily by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The views stretch from mountain to vineyard to beach at this gallery-like estate in Constantia. While the home nods to classic Cape Dutch architecture with a thatched roof and shuttered windows, the sculpture and photography found throughout are decidedly contemporary. Taste wines at the estates in nearby Constantia and take day trips to the mountains, beaches, and city neighborhoods of Cape Town.Vines twine over the pergolas and nearly 2 acres of private gardens surround the villa’s heated swimming pool and tennis court. As dusk settles over the valley, bring out a South African bottle from the wine cellar to sip in the alfresco lounge area or savor with dinner from the braai area.From the sculpture by the pool to the oversized artwork and African photography above the living-room fireplace, contemporary art defines this home. Take it in from the sectional in the living room, one of the velvety seats around the dining-room table, or while doing meal prep in the fully equipped open kitchen.Let views all the way to beachside Muizenberg and the False Bay coast inspire you to explore the area. Take a wine tour of the Constantia region or get in touch with the scenery by teeing off at a local golf course. It’s about a 15-minute drive to the Cape Town city center, where you can browse boutiques along the V&A Waterfront, learn about the history behind the colorful homes of the Bo-Kaap area, and take a cable car up iconic Table Mountain. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Anassa is an outstanding luxury villa in the high-end enclave of Clifton, just south of Cape Town. Perfectly situated just minutes from Clifton Beach and Camps Bay, the villa enjoys extraordinary sunset views of the Atlantic Ocean and the Twelve Apostles Mountain Range. Stunning alfresco living spaces including a lovely plunge pool, along with superb interior living areas and four deluxe bedroom suites, provide an ideal setting for families and groups of friends. Your vacation rental includes a private chef, housekeeping, and airport transfer to Cape Town International.Perched on a highland slope overlooking the Western Cape coastline and sea, the tri-level home enjoys breathtaking views from its ample terrace and upper-level balconies. Enjoy enchanting days by the gem-toned plunge pool, savoring the ocean breeze and exquisite sunlight on elegant loungers. In the afternoon, cook a barbeque lunch and relish it alfresco; and at sunset, drink delicious South African wine in the outdoor lounge while gazing on the dreamy horizon.The pool terrace joins the interior living room through ample glass doors, allowing the home to breathe the Atlantic air. A lovely, two-way fireplace warms the cozy lounge area and the ocean-view dining table, while the luminous kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and an espresso machine. There is also a separate media room with cozy furnishings and large TV. Throughtout the home, the understated elegance of the design and décor provides stylish luxury while harmonizing with this mountainous coastline's exquisite natural beauty.The villa features three bedrooms with king beds and one with a queen, accommodating eight guests in all. Three of the four bedrooms open to balconies, and all have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and tubs. The fabulous master suite enjoys corner views of the ocean through ample windows.Anassa enjoys a spectacular location within these renowned suburbs on the Cape Peninsula's sunset coast. With Cape Town's world-class art and dining just fifteen minutes away, you're also an easy drive to the iconic and gorgeous Twelve Apostles Mountains, including neaerby Lion's Head, while two-world class beaches and their adjioning towns—Camps Bay and Clifton—are just over five minutes from your garage. Complimentary airport transfer makes Anassa a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The sea seems close enough to spill into the pool at high tide at this glassed-in, art-filled beach house on Camps Bay. Though this sleek, gallery-like villa is backed by the Cape Town mountains, it’s kept luminous by walls of windows overlooking the ocean. It’s less than a 10-minute drive to both the beach and the Twelve Apostles.Trust the villa’s butler and housekeeper to make your holiday comfortable, whether it’s advising on the South African wine to serve with dinner or helping you heat up the barbecue. Spend days swimming in and lounging by the pool, and if you’ve gone out surfing or hiking, follow it up with a stretch in the private gym and a session in the sauna.What feels like acres of glass, framed in black steel, keeps the focus on the ocean views. A fireplace and plenty of seating create an inviting vibe in the open-concept living area, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen. Look for colorful modern art and ornate sculptures both here and throughout this vacation rental.The home’s 5 bedrooms include 1 with a kitchenette and 1 guest apartment: an ideal setup for bigger groups of family or friends who want to explore on their own.And there’s lots to explore, from the trails running around the Twelve Apostles (of which there are actually 18) to the cable car up Table Mountain. Drive 7 minutes to Camps Bay Beach for a swim or a cocktail at one of its chic oceanfront spots.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Elegant European style meets the incredible South African scenery at Cloud House. The classic lines and comfortable modern interiors of this Cape Town vacation rental are a beautiful contrast to the rugged lines of the Twelve Apostles. The villa’s quiet courtyard is a private place to entertain and relax, but a short walk brings guests to the surf and sand of Camps Bay Beach.Listen to the waves in the distance and revel in the sunshine in the tucked-away courtyard, which has a lap pool, a lawn large enough for games, a barbecue, and lounging and dining areas. There’s a gym where guests can keep up on their fitness routines while on holiday, an office in case you need to catch up on work and a home theatre where you can enjoy the company of friends and family.The interiors of Cloud House take inspiration from its name, rendered in shades of white and cream that lend a fresh appeal. Traditional touches such as French doors and columned porches are paired with contemporary pieces such as wicker and Lucite side tables and a sleek fireplace for an eclectic, modern look. The living and dining rooms are angled around the outdoor sitting area, and flow seamlessly into the fully equipped kitchen.The villa has three bedrooms with king beds and two with queen beds; all five have en-suite bathrooms. Neutral tones, clean-lined furnishings and large mullioned windows create an atmosphere of quiet luxury in the suites. For larger parties, a sofa bed provides extra accommodations.With restaurants, shops and bars less than a 15-minute walk away, Cloud House makes it easy to explore this lively oceanfront suburb. You can also stroll to Camps Bay Beach, a stretch of white sand that’s popular with everyone from local families and keen surfers to visiting honeymooners, or drive to Koeël Bay Market, where you’ll find a tempting array of hand-crafted items that make great souvenirs. Of course, a trip to Cape Town wouldn’t be complete without taking in the views from Table Mountain, Lion’s Head or the Twelve Apostles—all less than a 10-minute drive from Cloud House.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just minutes from Cape Town’s many attractions, this South African vacation villa is ready to host your next amazing Luxury Retreat. With four beautiful en-suite bedrooms, a spacious interior, and lush gardens, Villa Olivia is perfect for a family getaway, couples retreat, or an exciting vacation with friends. The landscape of Cape Town ranges from sandy beachfront to dynamic mountains, with a vibrant city and bay in between. And, you’ll be able to enjoy all of it without having to travel more than a few minutes.Villa Olivia is a joy to explore. With its thoughtful decor and ornate detailing, you’re sure to find something new to enjoy, even a few days into your stay. The living room is decorated with comfortable designer furniture. It opens directly to the lounge area of the terrace, increasing your hosting space, and allowing fresh air and natural sunlight to fill the open concept interior. The television lounge is a little more playful in its design and the perfect setting for a family movie night. The kitchen features high-end appliances and a gorgeous breakfast bar with custom bar stools and lighting.To make your stay as stress-free as possible, Olivia comes with daily housekeeping, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a security system, and a washer/dryer. Outside, there’s a swimming pool, alfresco dining, and sun loungers on the terrace.A great way to start your exploration of Cape Town is with a cable car trip to the top of Table Mountain. The mountain is also climbable if you’re feeling ambitious, it takes about two-hours, and the most accessible trail is at Platteklip Gorge. From the top of the mountain, you’ll have an amazing view of nearby beaches Camps Bay and Clifton Beach, as well as the downtown area of Cape Town. Fine dining, shopping, nightlife, and museums are all easy to find in town. And, if you’re looking for an adventure, there are several companies that offer deep sea fishing, surfing, and diving excursions.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set yourself up for a wonderful seaside holiday at Casa di Mare. This stunning Crete vacation rental is in the village of Skaleta just outside Rethymno, close to beautiful beaches and lively towns. Its five bedrooms and range of amenities invite you and up to twelve friends or family members to spend a week or two in sun-splashed luxury.Begin your stay with a complimentary welcome basket, then settle in on one of the loungers overlooking the ocean from a spot by the infinity pool or send the kids to work off some energy on the private playground. Enjoy some friendly competition inside around the ping-pong table, relax with the help of the wine fridge and sauna, or watch the stars come out from the al-fresco jetted tub. The villa also has a TV, Wi-Fi and laundry facilities.The open-concept great room at Casa di Mare stretches nearly the length of the house, from the front terrace to the backyard. Its sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen get a sleek, cool look from an all-white color scheme that’s warmed up by a wood table and breakfast bar.The villa has two bedrooms with double beds—one with an en-suite bathroom and one with a shared bathroom—and one bedroom with two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a double bed and two twin beds, respectively, and share a bathroom with en-suite access from both rooms.Casa di Mare is located in the village of Skaleta, which has a sandy beach ideal for honeymoon-style strolls, a choice of cafes and bars, and a bus stop that makes it easy to access other towns nearby. It’s also a short drive from a grocery store, bakery and more in the towns of Sfakaki and Stavromenos, more shopping and dining in Rethymno, and the historic Monastery of Arkadi.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Taste some of the finest wines and food in South Africa within steps of this Cape Dutch masterpiece in the heart of Franschhoek. Situated on a working vineyard within the La Clé des Montagnes estate, the home is practically a resort unto itself, with a private swimming pool and tennis court, a chipping-and-putting green, and even a helipad. The vintage lodge embodies the archetypal elegance of the region’s 17th-century architectural style--with white walls, green wooden shutters, and thatched roofing--enhanced with top-of-the-line appliances and superb contemporary artwork. Enjoy tranquil afternoons in the outdoor lounge with mountain views, or curl up by the fireplace in the evening with a bottle from a local winery. At mealtime, gather in the cavernous dining room for a chef-made feast under vaulted beams and pendant lanterns. And at night’s end, retreat to one of the villa’s beautifully rustic bedrooms, including the Garden Rooms, the Courtyard Room, and the dreamy perch of the Petite Room on the top floor.Steeped in history and natural beauty, Franschhoek has established itself in modern times as the wine and dining capital of South Africa. The list of stellar restaurants and cafes runs long, including The Tasting Room, Foliage, and La Petite Colombe, while myriad boutique wineries and full-day wine tours beckon to the oenophile. Explore the region’s unique blend of Cape Dutch and French culture at the Huguenot Museum, and experience the natural splendors of the Western Cape in the Mont Rochelle Nature Reserve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Whimsical artwork and a high standard of luxury make Dar El Sadaka a truly unique retreat. Set on 25 acres of private gardens in the heart of Marrakech, this exceptional vacation rental was conceived by a visual artist and bursts with both beautiful natural scenery and man-made personality. Reserve its nine bedrooms for a family reunion, intimate destination wedding or simply a stylish getaway with up to seventeen friends.In keeping with the long tradition of gracious Moroccan hospitality, your holiday at Dar El Sadaka includes daily breakfast, housekeeping and turndown, as well as the services of a chef and house staff. The villa’s grounds feature everything from a private running track, tennis court and yoga area to a ping-pong table, bocce court, children’s play area, traditional tent and sculpture garden. Relax by the pool, wander through palm and olive groves, and finish the evening at the al-fresco dining area. Inside, there are more resort-worthy amenities such as a home theater, bar, hammam and fitness room.High ceilings, mirrored walls, sleek furnishings and incredibly lifelike animal sculptures by French artist Jean-François Fourtou give the villa’s interiors a sense of both comfort and chic. From the mischievous apes in the living room to the graceful giraffe in the dining room, the creatures are welcome reminders that you’re here to enjoy yourself. As there is chef service, the professional kitchen is limited to staff use only.Dar El Sadaka has five bedrooms with king beds, two bedrooms with super king beds, one bedroom with a queen bed and one with a double bed; all nine have en-suite bathrooms. All of the bedrooms have their own animal sculptures, and many have honeymoon-suite-worthy details such as lounge areas, minibars, wood-burning stoves or private gardens and terraces.The villa’s Bab Atlas location puts you in the heart of the Palmeraie of Marrakech. From there, it’s a short drive to several other resorts, the city center, Royal Golf Marrakech and, when it’s time to leave, the airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sleek, modern and in one of the most exclusive suburbs of Cape Town, The Cheviots is the perfect private hideaway for a warm-weather family holiday or a beach getaway with friends. The bright, open indoor and outdoor living spaces of this luxury Camps Bay vacation rental stretch out in front of the ocean and mountain views for which the city is famous. Better still, the beach and mountains are just a short drive away from this five-bedroom haven.Each of the villa’s three levels opens to a terrace or balcony with breathtaking vistas of mountains and sea. Spend the day on a lounge chair in front of the pool, then, as night falls, heat up the barbecue, switch on the sound system and gather at the al-fresco dining area. Finish the evening sipping drinks from the outdoor bar or stargazing from the lounge area off the bedrooms, or, on cooler evenings, cozy up to the fireplace inside with a glass of a local vintage from the wine fridge.With a concrete frame clad in wall-to-wall sliding glass doors, The Cheviots angles around the pool deck in an L shape. An array of modern furnishings invites guests to the open-plan great room, from the minimalist sand-toned sofas and molded Eames-inspired dining chairs to the glass-topped accent and dining tables. The fully equipped kitchen opens to a second, more secluded outdoor dining area.Each of the five bedrooms at The Cheviots has an en-suite bathroom. The master suite has a king bed, lounge area and ocean views, and a second king bedroom, which could be used as a honeymoon suite, has its own lounge and dining areas, kitchenette, balcony and ocean views. There are two other bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds.If you can be tempted to leave the villa’s sunny terraces, it’s only a 3-minute drive to the oceanfront restaurants and white sands of Camps Bay Beach, and a 5-minute drive to local favorite Clifton Beach. Get close to South Africa’s incredible scenery with a hike around the Twelve Apostles or a cable-car ride up Table Mountain, or make the 7 km drive into central Cape Town to explore this lively, cosmopolitan city.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched at the foot of the Twelve Apostles Mountains, within easy walking distance of Camps Bay Beach, this contemporary masterwork offers panoramic ocean vistas from virtually every living area. Dip into the open-air hot tub and infinity pool, sip South African wine while admiring the sunset, and dine alfresco on chef-made feasts against the looming profile of Table Mountain.The villa is nestled amid the lush fynbos flora native to the West Cape, enveloping the terrace and interiors with a rustic naturalism. The L-shaped infinity pool wraps around the ample outdoor lounge, inviting serene relaxation under the sun or stars. The alfresco dining area extends from the kitchen, an inspiring venue for memorable meals.The main formal dining area is positioned inside a wide threshold, enjoying perfectly framed views of the vast Atlantic. A luminous, fully equipped kitchen features chef-ready appliances and easily serves both dining areas. A comfortable, hearth-warmed lounge opens to the terrace through wide glass doors, creating a graceful flow of space during parties or downtime. Air conditioning, heating, excellent media features, and a home gym create a comfortable environment for all guests.The master suite and primary guest suite command ocean-facing positions on the upper floor, with ensuite bathrooms, private balconies, and breathtaking views. There are 3 guest suites with ensuite bathrooms, and a guestroom with access to a hall bathroom. All of the rooms include air conditioning, safe boxes, and TVs.Serenity Villa offers one of the finest locations for experiencing the manifold delights of Cape Town. You're about ten minutes on foot from the beach and nightlife of Camps Bay, and within easy driving distance of Clifton Beach, Lion's Head Mountain, and the city's vibrant art and culinary scene.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Wall-to-wall glass doorways lead to lush lawns, poolside lounge chairs, and elevated views that capture Capetown’s urban and ocean landscapes at this elegant hillside home. In the backyard, a fragrant floral-wall makes sure the neighbors won’t get jealous when you’re hosting garden parties. Can’t get enough South African sun? The cities best 2 beaches, Clifton and Camps Bay, are minutes away.The red sofas in the sunken living room create the perfect spot to catch up on some reading while the cool afternoon breeze flows through large sliding doors. Grab yourself a snack in the chic kitchen, decorated in a soothing red pastel and stocked with state of the art appliances. At lunch, grill up something fresh from a local market to enjoy in peace on the master bedroom’s private balcony.Villa Stanleon’s full-staff, indoor garage, and security system will take any vacation stress away, leaving you time to focus on pool parties, movie nights, and exciting excursions. Television and Wi-Fi will keep you connected, should you desire. And, when the afternoon heat is at its peak, you can always retreat to the air-conditioned bedrooms.Looking for a great photo-op? The top of Lion’s Head, that mountain on all the postcards, has the best views in Capetown, and it only takes about 90-minutes to hike. Once atop, lay out a blanket for a picnic or reward yourself with lunch from the cafe. Once you’ve made your descent, go shopping, sample local beers, or dance the night away at V&A Waterfront, Capetown’s entertainment capital. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Fendi Penthouse is a stunning luxury residence within the Kempinski Hotel Bahia, a five-star, beachfront gem on the Costa del Sol of Spain, near the towns of Estepona and Marbella. Ideal for two couples or a family, the apartment features ample outdoor living areas including a hot tub with sweeping sea views, along with superbly equipped interiors with high-end amenities for cooking and entertainment. Each of the two deluxe bedrooms features a king bed and media system with projector and screen. Additionally, guests enjoy access to the hotel’s fabulous amenities, including three shared outdoor swimming pools and a wellness center with gym, sauna, and steam room.The penthouse is ideally designed for savoring the expansive views and delightful breezes blowing in from the Mediterranean. Relax in the stylish sun bed; dine alfresco at the lovely table for four; and savor a soothing soak in the hot tub as you gaze at the vast horizon. At night, kindle the outdoor fire feature and open a bottle of fine Spanish wine.Glass doors join the patio with the open-concept interior, inviting delicious air into the home. The open-concept space features a chic yet comfortable lounge with large TV and gas fireplace, as well as a superb kitchen with chef-grade appliances and a bar. Additional features include air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and an excellent sound system.The exceptional master suite includes a sumptuous king bed, private balcony, mini bar, and open-concept bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and superb soaking tub. The guest room has a king bed and access to a hallway bathroom with steam shower. The sofa in the living room can be folded out as a bed for additional guests.In addition to the hotel's superb amenities, you'll enjoy proximity to Bahia Beach Club and Andalucía Beach, as well the town of Estepona, famed for its beaches, watersport spots, and beautiful old city. The renowned resort and nightlife destination of Marbella is about thirty kilometers along the coast to the northeast, on the way to Malaga—birthplace of Picasso.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please Note: This villa is closed between November 1st and March 31st every year.Fterlari Villa seems to float above the Santorini Caldera, with soaring views of the volcanic ridges and Aegean Sea. One of the island's most renowned homes, its design blends the luminous forms of ancient Cycladic culture with rustic Greek features and high-end modern amenities, including a pool and spa. Marvel at the sunset in utter seclusion or drive minutes to the age-old towns of Oia and Fira.The lemon-yellow accents of the villa's exterior harmonize with the lush greens of the hillside and radiant blues of the sky and sea. Savor a refreshing dip in the morning light, and bask in the sun on lounge chairs facing the vast horizon. Relish alfresco meals from the wood-fire oven and barbeque, and toast the sunset with a glass of locally produced wine. Cap the evening with a hot tub soak under the vault of brilliant stars.Arched doorways imbibe the sea-fresh air into the cool interiors. Fresh white surfaces accentuate the natural luminosity and deft touches of lemon, lime, and blue. This classic Greek palette culminates in the vibrant kitchen, where chef-quality appliances are set amid artisanal tile work. A comfortable living room welcomes ouza tastings before dinner, while the loft above the dining room is perfect for quiet afternoons or late-night relaxation.The bedrooms are furnished with an elegant minimalism, each featuring a double bed and air conditioning. The 2 guestrooms share a bathroom, while the master enjoys an ensuite bathroom and opens to the terrace and sea views.The villa is perched between the quaint village of Oia and the larger town of Fira (or Thera). The nearest beach is Exo Yalos, just 4.5 kilometers away. Extraordinary outdoor opportunities include hiking the caldera, scuba diving, windsurfing, and boat trips amid the islands.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Choose a magazine-worthy backdrop for your Cape Town getaway at Aquatic Villa. This contemporary Camps Bay vacation rental is set on the slopes of Table Mountain, affords stunning views of the Atlantic and is only a 10-minute walk from the beach. Reserve the entire five-bedroom property for a holiday with friends and extended family, as the three-bedroom Aquatic House or as the two-bedroom Aquatic Penthouse for a honeymoon-style escape.This luxury property has several levels of terraces facing the ocean, with a swimming pool, plunge pool, sun loungers, a built-in barbecue and two 8-seater al-fresco dining areas on the ground level and a 4-seater on the top floor terrace. Inside, you’ll find a sound system, TV and Wi-Fi, as well as an exercise room and an elevator to whisk you from the garage up to the sea view living areas.Bright and beautifully appointed, the modern interiors of Aquatic Villa showcase the ocean views and have been featured in magazines from Australia’s Modern Home and Emirates Home in the UAE to Casa Deco in Germany and Habitat in South Africa. Sliding glass doors let you open the great rooms to the terraces, creating seamless indoor-outdoor living areas, while neutral tones and natural textures have refined appeal in the living and dining areas and fully equipped kitchen.There are three bedrooms in Aquatic House and two in Aquatic Penthouse; all five have king beds, private en-suite bathrooms and balconies or patio. The house has two bedrooms with ocean views and one with garden and mountain views, and both penthouse bedrooms look out over the iconic mountains of Cape Town.Aquatic Villa is a 5-minute drive or less from both Camps Bay Beach and Clifton Beach, where you’ll find oceanfront restaurants and unique shops along with sand and sea, and a 6-minute drive from Lion’s Head. A 15-minute drive or less will bring you to downtown Cape Town, Table Mountain or the Atlantic Seaboard; go just a few minutes farther to visit the charming V&A Waterfront.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in one of Southern Spain's most prestigious gated communities, Villa Rio Verde enjoys a secluded atmosphere with privacy provided by lush local greenery. Within the communities gates, you'll find a golf course and tennis courts. Just beyond, the beautiful city of Marbella and the Costa del Sol are ready to play host to your exciting nights on the town, afternoon shopping trips, and unforgettable dining experiences. And, all of this is located within eight kilometers of Villa Rio Verde's luxurious estate.Spanish colonial revivalist architecture has always been the ideal style for open-air homes in warm climates, and at Villa Rio Verde you'll see all of its iconic character traits. At the villa's center, there's a serene courtyard with a fountain; it connects several of the common areas. Exposed wood beams, terracotta roof tiles, and vaulted ceilings give Rio Verde a spacious, earthy feel, while elegant designer furniture and high tech electronics provide modern luxury. Nearly all of the interior common spaces and bedrooms have large openings to the terrace, creating a free-flowing environment. And, in the kitchen, you'll love the functional layout, granite counters, and high-end appliances.Outside, the covered terrace acts more like a second living room with its two couches, a sun bed, sitting areas, and fireplace. Between the covered terrace and the main house, you'll find vibrant green lawns and a refreshing swimming pool. And, back inside, unique spaces like the home theatre, media room, pool table, fitness room, and sauna will keep guests engaged and entertained.The nearest beachfront is Playa Puerto Banus. At just under two-kilometers, you'll be working on your tan in no time. The beach is protected by a breakwater, so the swimming cove is calm, perfect for children and first-time snorkelers. The white sandy shores are lined with beach facilities, lounger and parasol rentals, and delicious beachfront restaurants. In the town of Marbella, you'll find beautiful ancient architecture, high-end shopping, Casino Marbella, and numerous tourism activities and excursions.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in Sotogrande, on the Costa del Sol, this Spanish luxury home enjoys its secluded lifestyle, while being just a short drive from the excitement of Estepona, Marbella, and Gibraltar. Perfect for a family vacation, retreat with colleagues, or a sunny getaway with a group of friends, Villa Sotoasis features five luxurious en-suite bedrooms, and numerous indoor/outdoor lounge areas to accommodate your group of ten. Nearby, you’ll find sandy beachfront, local shops, and several world-class golf courses.From the exterior, Sotoasis shows off modernized Caribbean architecture with its spacious veranda, clay-tiled roof, and numerous openings to the lush lawns and gardens of the backyard. Inside, the villa is sleek and stylish. With areas like the indoor swimming pool and sauna, the home theatre, and the grand piano lounge, it's easy for Sotoasis to show off its luxurious side. By the indoor pool, the wet bar and lounge is another relaxing place to enjoy group activity or break away for more intimate occasions. In the kitchen, you’ll appreciate the exceptionally spacious layout, functional workspaces, and restaurant-caliber stainless steel appliances.Outside, you’ll find lounge areas, with seating for the whole group, throughout the yard-length covered terrace. The back lawn, leading to the swimming pool, is vibrant green and perfect for a special outdoor event. There’s also an alfresco dining set and barbecue on the terrace. Back inside, Sotoasis is equipped with Wi-Fi and a home office to help keep you connected. And, there’s a gym with state of the art fitness equipment, great for keeping up with daily routines.The nearest beach to Sotoasis is Playa de Torreguardiaro, about twelve kilometers from home. There, you’ll find calm waters and vibrant urban surroundings. If there’s a golfer in your group, Real Club Valderrama is consistently rated among the world’s best courses, and, although it’s a private members club, visitors are welcome. In its rich history, Valderrama has hosted numerous PGA events, and it is a must-play for any golf aficionado.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Admire incredible seascapes without and stunning artwork within at Sea Lion. Filled with paintings, photographs and sculpture, this contemporary Cape Town vacation rental feels like a private gallery. Its setting in the Fresnaye neighborhood and masterful architecture combine to offer views of the Atlantic and Robben Island from every room.Your holiday at Sea Lion begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a housekeeper and chef. A choice of landscaped terraces lets you decide whether you’d rather enjoy views of the ocean or the mountains, while sun loungers, a swimming pool and a barbecue make it easy to relax or entertain. This luxury residence also has its own exercise room, home theater, bar and wine cellar, as well as sound and security systems and Wi-Fi.Designed by Greg Wright Architects and featured in several magazines, the villa is an incredible contemporary space. Sleek lines in the open-concept living and dining areas are countered by warm natural textures of granite, walnut and marble, and huge sliding doors let you open the space completely to the terrace. While chef service is included, there’s also a fully equipped gourmet kitchen.Each of the four bedrooms at Sea Lion has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; together, they can accommodate up to eight friends or family members. Three of the bedrooms open to a balcony, and the fourth has its own entrance, making it perfect for an in-law suite or a honeymoon-style haven.A location in the city’s exclusive Fresnaye area puts guests of Sea Lion within a short drive of the popular Clifton Beach and Camps Bay Beach, as well as shopping, dining and entertainment in the Cape Town city center. Be sure to bring your camera and walking shoes to explore local landmarks Table Mountain and Lion’s Head, both of which are nearby.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
